alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 7:08PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Collier County through 800 PM EDT... At 708 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud over West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, or near Golden Gate Estates, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marco Island, Golden Gate Estates, Belle Meade, Marco Island Airport, Golden Gate, Lely Resort, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Royal Palm Hammock, South Blocks Golde, Fakahatchee Strand State Preserve, Picayune Strand State Forest, Port Of The Island, Goodland, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd, Fiddlers Creek and Key Marco. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
